titles.title: Oversight of Anti-Competitive Behavior of Non-Profit Hospitals Act
Oversight of Anti-Competitive Behavior of Non-Profit Hospitals Act
To give the Federal Trade Commission authority over certain tax-exempt organizations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Oversight of Anti-Competitive Behavior of Non-Profit Hospitals Act
This bill provides the Federal Trade Commission with enforcement authority over certain tax-exempt, hospital or cooperative hospital service organizations.
